title: Calories in Large McDonald's Chips
meta_description: Learn calories in large McDonald's chips (about 510 kcal per serving), plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Standard McDonald's large fries (chips), ~154g serving, fried in vegetable oil blend; UK/US portion similar; no dips or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, oil type, portion size, and preparation; values based on official McDonald's data—check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One large serving of McDonald's chips provides ~510 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

faqs.q: How many calories in large McDonald's chips?
What are the carbs in McDonald's large chips?
faqs.a: About 66g total carbs, including 6g fiber and 0g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a large serving of McDonald's chips?
Are McDonald's large chips high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 350mg sodium per serving—request no salt to reduce.

faqs.q: How does portion size affect calories in McDonald's chips?
faqs.a: Small: ~230 kcal, medium: ~340 kcal, large: 510 kcal—based on standard sizes.
